thread.title: What to gift your beau: Alia Bhatt's V-Day suggestions
thread.title_full: What to gift your beau: Alia Bhatt's V-Day suggestions

author: Koimoi.Com Team
title: What to gift your beau: Alia Bhatt's V-Day suggestions
text: tweet Love has different meanings for different people for some it could be a fun evening outdoors in nature, and for others, it could be a lavish gift. Actress Alia Bhatt says that even a small gift can be as special as a “limited edition”, if given with pure love. The actress, who has given some remarkable performances in films like “ Udta Punjab ” and “ Highway “, is a brand ambassador of Cornetto and recently launched their Red Velvet Limited edition ice cream. Giving her suggestions for gifts a woman can give to her beau, she says: * Sneakers: All boys have a soft corner for the latest pair of kicks, and there is no such thing as too many sneakers. A pair of limited edition sneakers is sure to do the trick. What to gift your beau: Alia Bhatt’s V-Day suggestions * Swiss army knife: This is for the outdoorsy, adventure-seeking man, while this is something on the pricey side it is something he will truly treasure on each trip. * Watches: This is for someone who loves old school charm a time piece would be a great way to say that you will love him for all time. * Books: A signed copy or a limited edition print of his favourite book would be his prized possession forever. SHARE
